dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so yeah, the EU's like, sixteenth package of sanctions, it's out, and guess what? Two Kazakhstani companies are on it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so yeah, the E U's like, sixteenth package of sanctions, it's out, and guess what? Two Kazakhstani companies are on it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the 16th package of EU sanctions includes two Kazakhstani companies: MetallStan LLP and KAZSTANEX LLP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? Two? Out of how many, exactly? And why should we, uh, care?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Two? Out of how many, exactly? And why should we, uh, care?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, MetallStan LLP and KAZSTANEX LLP. The Ministry of Trade said, um, they're involved in, like, supplying sanctioned goods to Russia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, MetallStan L L P and KAZSTANEX L L P. The Ministry of Trade said, um, they're involved in, like, supplying sanctioned goods to Russia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Trade emphasized that, according to the EU, these companies may be involved in supplying sanctioned goods to Russia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: "Involved." Right. Is that what the ministry said? Or is that what the EU thinks? Because those are two very different things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Involved. Right. Is that what the ministry said? Or is that what the E U thinks? Because those are two very different things.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: The EU, yeah. And, uh, it means asset freezes, no financial transactions, no trade with EU entities. Big deal for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The E U, yeah. And, uh, it means asset freezes, no financial transactions, no trade with E U entities. Big deal for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The inclusion of Kazakhstani companies in the EU sanctions list will lead to the freezing of their assets, if any, within the EU, as well as a ban on financial transactions and trade with individuals and legal entities from the EU,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: "Big deal for them." But the ministry, of course, assures everyone it has "no consequences for Kazakhstan's economy." Convenient, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Big deal for them. But the ministry, of course, assures everyone it has no consequences for Kazakhstan's economy. Convenient, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the ministry's press service assured that the inclusion of these companies in the EU sanctions list does not have any consequences for Kazakhstan's economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's what they said in their, um, official inquiry response to Tengrinews. They're trying to downplay it, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's what they said in their, um, official inquiry response to Tengrinews. They're trying to downplay it, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to an official inquiry from Tengrinews.kz, the Ministry of Trade reported that the 16th package of EU sanctions includes two Kazakhstani companies

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: "Downplay it." Or, like, totally spin it. KAZSTANEX, isn't that the machine tools one? And they have an office in Tashkent, too, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Downplay it. Or, like, totally spin it. KAZSTANEX, isn't that the machine tools one? And they have an office in Tashkent, too, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The headquarters of KAZSTANEX LLP is located in Almaty, with an additional office in Tashkent, Uzbekistan. The company is one of the leading global manufacturers of machine tools and industrial equipment in the Kazakhstani market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's them. Leading manufacturers. MetallStan's more general wholesale, I think, registered in 2012.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's them. Leading manufacturers. MetallStan's more general wholesale, I think, registered in twenty twelve.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to publicly available sources, MetallStan LLP was registered in May 2012 and is engaged in wholesale trade of a wide range of goods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. And these are just the EU sanctions, though. Weren't these same two companies, like, already on the US and UK lists back in October?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. And these are just the E U sanctions, though. Weren't these same two companies, like, already on the U S and U K lists back in October?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that in October 2024, these companies were also added to the U.S. and UK sanctions lists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah, that's true. The article does, um, mention that. So, this isn't entirely new for them, I suppose.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah, that's true. The article does, um, mention that. So, this isn't entirely new for them, I suppose.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's the big, uh, revelation here then? That the EU finally caught up? Or that Kazakhstan's ministry is still pretending it's fine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's the big, uh, revelation here then? That the E U finally caught up? Or that Kazakhstan's ministry is still pretending it's fine?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: No, just that it's the EU's turn now, expanding the, uh, scope of the sanctions. More pressure, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, just that it's the E U's turn now, expanding the, uh, scope of the sanctions. More pressure, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: "More pressure." Right. On them, maybe. Not on the economy, according to the official line. I'm just, I'm not buying it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: More pressure. Right. On them, maybe. Not on the economy, according to the official line. I'm just, I'm not buying it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, the freezing of assets within the EU is, um, a pretty direct consequence for the companies themselves. If they have any assets within the EU, Host_B. If.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, the freezing of assets within the E U is, um, a pretty direct consequence for the companies themselves. If they have any assets within the E U, Host_B. If.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The inclusion of Kazakhstani companies in the EU sanctions list will lead to the freezing of their assets, if any, within the EU

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: And how much of this is just, uh, for show? I guess we'll, like, have to wait and see if there are ripple effects. Or if Kazakhstan just, you know, keeps shrugging it off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And how much of this is just, uh, for show? I guess we'll, like, have to wait and see if there are ripple effects. Or if Kazakhstan just, you know, keeps shrugging it off.
